channel.title: Max brushsides?
channel.description: Hello, can anyone tell me whats the Brushside Limit is in the Black Mesa VBSP Compiler? My compiler hit the limit. I have 6000 Solids, 36528 Faces & 5122 Solid Entites.

item.title: Max brushsides?
item.dc:creator: RK1
item.description:
65536 Brushsides is the limit. Personally, I found hammerâ€™s counter to be somewhat inaccurate, which makes sense due to things that happen during compilation.

When in doubt, trust the numbers the compiler gives you. In this case, Try visgrouping a section or two out until it compiles and that should give you a general idea of where you stand.

Read full topic
